name: bettercallclaude-legal-citations
description: Validate, format, convert, and extract Swiss legal citations across DE/FR/IT/EN. Part of the BetterCallClaude Swiss Legal Intelligence suite.

tools.name: validate_citation
tools.description: Validate a Swiss legal citation (BGE/ATF/DTF or statutory) with normalized output

tools.name: format_citation
tools.description: Format a Swiss legal citation to a specific language (DE/FR/IT/EN)

tools.name: convert_citation
tools.description: Convert a citation from one language to another with auto-detection

tools.name: parse_citation
tools.description: Parse a Swiss legal citation and extract all components

tools.name: get_provision_text
tools.description: Retrieve the official text of a Swiss statutory provision from Fedlex

tools.name: extract_citations
tools.description: Extract all legal citations from a document or text

tools.name: standardize_document_citations
tools.description: Standardize all legal citations in a document to a consistent format and language

tools.name: compare_citation_versions
tools.description: Compare different versions of a statutory provision over time
